subject: World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: The technology, new to the World Cup, confirmed a goal by France in the 48th minute, but not before the system first showed a replay of the ball just after it struck the post and indicating “no goal.”
snippet: The technology, new to the World Cup, confirmed a goal by France in the 48th minute, but not before the system first showed a replay of the ball just after it struck the post and indicating “no goal.”
